price: Ó vós que credes! Se socorreis a Allah, Ele vos socorrerá e vos tornará firmes os passos.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
